# gMCPShiny

A Shiny app for graphical multiplicity control.

## Installation

``` r
# The easiest way to get gMCPShiny is to install:
install.packages("gMCPShiny")

# Alternatively, install development version from GitHub:
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Merck/gMCPShiny")
```

## Example

To run the app locally:

``` r
gMCPShiny::run_app()
```

## Deployed instances

### Production version

- <https://rinpharma.shinyapps.io/gmcp/> (faster and more scalable
  access)
- <https://gmcp.shinyapps.io/prod/>

### Development version

- <https://gmcp.shinyapps.io/devel/>

# Package index

## Application

- [`run_app()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/run_app.md)
  : Run Shiny app

## Graph operations

- [`df2graph()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/df2graph.md)
  : Convert transitions data frame into an hgraph matrix
- [`hgraph_palette()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/hgraph_palette.md)
  : Adaptive color palette generator for hGraph

## Shiny UI components

- [`navbarFluidPage()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/navbarFluidPage.md)
  : Create a page with a top level navigation bar within a fluid
  container
- [`headerCard()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/headerCard.md)
  : Card with header
- [`renderRcode()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/renderRcode.md)
  [`rcodeOutput()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/renderRcode.md)
  : Render R code with syntax highlighting
- [`renderRmd()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/renderRmd.md)
  [`rmdOutput()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/renderRmd.md)
  : Render R Markdown with syntax highlighting
- [`matrixButtonGroup()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/matrixButtonGroup.md)
  [`addMatrixRow()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/matrixButtonGroup.md)
  [`delMatrixRow()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/matrixButtonGroup.md)
  : Matrix buttons
- [`textInputAddonRight()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/textInputAddonRight.md)
  : Text input addon
- [`fileButtonInput()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/fileButtonInput.md)
  : File input button
- [`helpLink()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/helpLink.md)
  : Help link
- [`helpPopover()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/helpPopover.md)
  : Help popovers

## Input/output utilities

- [`arithmetic_to_numeric()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/arithmetic_to_numeric.md)
  : Convert arithmetic (character) format to numeric
- [`sanitize_filename()`](https://merck.github.io/gMCPShiny/reference/sanitize_filename.md)
  : Sanitizes file name
